n0.production_summary.strategy_role: a production summary for the project
strategy_hints: Focus on narrative function: a production summary for stakeholders.
Use only facts from the provided context and constraints.
Signal tone through neutral diction, not evaluation.
Respect the length target and single-paragraph format.
redaction_rules: No meta-writing language or references to strategy or sources.
Keep statements grounded in the project brief only.
quality_criteria: Summary length stays within min/max chars.
All statements are traceable to provided context.
n0.production_summary.extra_rule: Writing rule (English): Tell the summary as a visual story, like a storyteller who takes time to narrate a beautiful scene.

n0.art_direction.strategy_role: an art direction description for the project
strategy_hints: Describe concrete visual style elements (palette, textures, lighting).
Avoid story beats; focus on aesthetic direction only.
redaction_rules: One paragraph with concrete visual descriptors.
No meta-writing language or references to strategy.
n0.art_direction.extra_rule: Writing rule (English): Describe the aesthetic style of the video precisely, highlighting what makes it distinctive and recognizable.

n0.sound_direction.strategy_role: a sound direction description for the project
strategy_hints: Describe concrete sonic elements (timbre, rhythm, texture).
Avoid story beats; focus on sonic direction only.
redaction_rules: One paragraph with concrete sonic descriptors.
No meta-writing language or references to strategy.
n0.sound_direction.extra_rule: Writing rule (English): Describe the sonic and musical style of the video precisely, highlighting what makes it distinctive and recognizable.
